summary: Mobile Admin UI Testing - ALL TESTS PASSED. Verified (1) Students tab floating action bar appears on mobile when cards selected, shows selection count, Pre-sale On/Off buttons, and Clear (X) button (2) Floating bar hidden on desktop (sm:hidden class works) (3) Access Requests tab shows mobile card view with Aprobar/Rechazar buttons visible on mobile.
passed_tests: Students tab: Mobile floating action bar hidden initially when no students selected
Students tab: Floating action bar (data-testid='mobile-action-bar') appears at bottom when student checkbox clicked
Students tab: Floating bar shows '1 sel.' for single selection
Students tab: Pre-sale On button (data-testid='mobile-presale-on') visible in floating bar
Students tab: Pre-sale Off button (data-testid='mobile-presale-off') visible in floating bar
Students tab: Clear (X) button (data-testid='mobile-clear-selection') visible in floating bar
Students tab: Clicking Clear button hides floating bar and clears selection
Students tab: Floating bar shows '2 sel.' when 2 students selected
Students tab: Floating bar hidden on desktop (sm:hidden class) - verified at 1920px
Students tab: Desktop shows toolbar buttons (bulk-presale-on, bulk-presale-off) instead of floating bar
Access Requests tab: Mobile card view shows request cards with border-l-primary styling
Access Requests tab: 21 request cards found on mobile
Access Requests tab: Aprobar (Approve) button visible in mobile card
Access Requests tab: Rechazar (Reject) button visible in mobile card
Access Requests tab: Cards show student name, school, year/grade, requested by info
critical_code_review_comments: StudentsTab.jsx lines 467-487: Mobile floating action bar correctly implemented with sm:hidden, fixed bottom-16 positioning
StudentsTab.jsx line 469: data-testid='mobile-action-bar' added for testing
StudentsTab.jsx line 474: mobile-presale-on button with orange styling
StudentsTab.jsx line 482: mobile-clear-selection button with X icon
StudentRequestsTab.jsx lines 536-618: Mobile card view with block sm:hidden properly shows approve/reject buttons
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile floating action bar in Students tab fully tested. Key testids: mobile-action-bar (wrapper), mobile-presale-on, mobile-presale-off, mobile-clear-selection. Navigation: Admin > Unatienda (sidebar) > Students tab. The bar uses fixed bottom-16 positioning and sm:hidden to only show on mobile. Access Requests tab mobile card view already had approve/reject buttons working. Login via API POST /api/auth-v2/login returns 'token' key.

feature_verification.mobile_floating_action_bar: PASSED - Appears when students selected, hidden when none
feature_verification.hidden_on_desktop: PASSED - sm:hidden class hides bar at 640px+
feature_verification.access_requests_approve_button: PASSED - Visible as 'Aprobar' in mobile card
feature_verification.access_requests_reject_button: PASSED - Visible as 'Rechazar' in mobile card

viewport_tests.mobile_390x844: PASSED - Floating bar visible, all buttons functional
viewport_tests.desktop_1920x1080: PASSED - Floating bar hidden, desktop toolbar shows instead
